questions.title: 有必要学好英语。
questions.answer: It's necessary to learn English well.

questions.title: 有必要改变一下你房子的装潢设计风格。
questions.answer: It's necessary to improve your house's style of design decoration.

questions.title: 有必要改变你奶奶封建落后的思想了。
questions.answer: It's necessary to change your grand-mother's feudal and backwardthoughts.

questions.title: 我们村长说有必要维持我们村的公路养护。
questions.answer: Our village head said it's necessary to maintain public highways in ourvillage.

questions.title: 有必要发展农业、提高食品质量了。
questions.answer: It's necessary to develop our agriculture and heighten food quality.

title: ——登机前我还需要做些什么？
——你需要检查你的护照和登机牌。

answer.en: Is there anything else I need to do before board?
It's necessary to inspect your passport and boarding check.

title: ——为什么我妈妈今天不理我？
——因为你让她失望了。
——我应该怎么做？
——首先你必须先提高你的考试成绩。

answer.en: Why does my mother turn a deaf ear to me today?
It's necessary to improve your exam result first.
